courseDetails.title: Practical Security Architecture - Hands on!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Hands-on Security Architecture: Building Secure, Reliable Systems following the industry best practices
courseDetails.longDescription:
Step into the world of distributed systems with our hands-on course that equips you with the skills and knowledge you need to build secure and reliable systems and act as a security architect. Tackle core challenges such as authentication, authorization, and secure communication while leveraging industry-standard technologies and patterns that prepare you for today’s dynamic threat landscape.


In this course, you'll get your hands dirty with real-world tools like Keycloak for authentication and OPA for precise policy enforcement. Master secure communication and traffic management using Nginx, and become adept at detecting and mitigating threats with OWASP CRS and ModSecurity. You'll integrate JWT for secure token management, Sidecar for modular architecture, and Reverse Proxy for efficient traffic handling. Plus, you'll implement secure protocols with digital certificates and HTTPS to ensure data integrity and privacy.


In this course, you will learn how to:

• Authenticate and verify identities using Keycloak as your identity provider.

• Control access with precision using OPA for policy enforcement.

• Secure communications and manage network traffic with Nginx acting as both the reverse proxy and sidecar.

• Detect and mitigate threats with OWASP CSR for robust threat detection rules and OWASP ModSecurity as your first line of defense.

• Integrate essential security patterns such as JWT for secure token management, Sidecar for modular architecture, and Reverse Proxy for efficient traffic handling.

• Implement secure protocols with digital certificates and HTTPS to ensure data integrity and privacy.


With our hands-on approach, every module empowers you to apply these techniques directly in real-world environments. This course is ideal for software developers, security professionals, architects, and anyone interested in designing and implementing secure systems.

Elevate your expertise in security architecture by engaging with interactive labs and exercises that transform theoretical concepts into deployable solutions.

courseDetails.title: Python 2000: Beyond The Basics
courseDetails.shortDescription: Secrets of the Pythonic Masters
courseDetails.longDescription:
Layered Learning

Never a "one size fits all" approach, our training opportunities are divided into beginner (1000), intermediate (2000), and advanced (3000 - 9000) experience levels. Rather than learning things you might not need to know, you can choose the topics that you are most interested in.  Written by a Principal Trainer & Principal Software Development Engineer, in order to insure mastery key topics are presented several times, as well as at ever-increasing depth. No practice, no glory?

Python Programmers Welcome!

Python 2000 is designed for students with a basic understanding of Python. In Python 2000: Beyond the Basics students will focus upon using Python for creating classes, managing packages & paths, creating frameworks, as well as exploring more advanced & modern topics in Modern Python.


Beyond Functional

Students will complete keyword mastery by exploring a large collection of activity-related topics. Students will enjoy learning how to create Lambdas, Generators, Context Managers, Packages & Modules, Classes, Factories, Frameworks, how to manage Exceptions, as well as other professional programming topics.

Training Approach

I have divided all my training into step-by-step modules. Numbered from 1000 to 9000, the numbering system allows us to skip things that we already know to focus upon the things that we do not.


After completing Python 2000 you are ready to next explore a large collection of activity-related topics. Numbered from 3000 - 9000 rather than learning things you might not need to know, you can choose the topics that you are most interested in. 


If you are new to programming, then you’ll want to enjoy my free Python Primer.
targetAudiences: Students must have completed Python 1000, or have an equivalent background in Python 3.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Prof. Rafael Ubal brings his methods and tools from his 10+ years of experience teaching in prestigious universities.

This course serves as an introduction to Python programming (no previous background needed). Whether you’re a high school student ahead of the game, a college student in search of additional support, a recent graduate preparing for a technical interview, an active professional seeking to expand your skill set, or just an amateur techie, this course is your ideal first exposure to the world of Python programming.

In this course, I’ve selected the most relevant topics to quickly get you started with Python. We’ll start with the basics: interaction with the user, arithmetic computations, conditional execution, loops, and functions. And we’ll also delve into more advanced topics: lists, tuples, dictionaries, file operations, and object-oriented programming. But most importantly: I’ll help you develop a programmer mindset by training your algorithmic thinking – an essential still that will help you quickly learn new programming languages in the future if you need to.

In most lessons of this course, I’ll be proposing interactive programming exercises, where I’ll ask you to pause the video and work on it, as I later guide through a step-by-step solution. You’ll work with a web-based code editor, where you’ll be able to write and test your programs, without installing any third-party software in your system; all you need is your web browser.

courseDetails.title: Professional Diploma of Virtual Executive Assistant
courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Diploma of Virtual Executive Assistant by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course Professional Diploma of Virtual Executive Assistant by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Role of a Virtual Executive Assistant

A Virtual Executive Assistant (VEA) acts as a remote, highly skilled administrative professional, providing support to executives, entrepreneurs, and high-level managers. Think of them as the traditional executive assistant, but one who works from anywhere in the world.


Typical Functionality of a VEA

  • Calendar Management: Scheduling meetings, organizing appointments, managing travel itineraries, and ensuring the executive's time is effectively used.

  • Email Management: Filtering, prioritizing, and responding to emails, drafting correspondence, and managing the executive's inbox.

  • Project Management: Tracking project deadlines, coordinating with team members, preparing reports, and aiding in overall project completion.

  • Travel Arrangements: Booking flights, hotels, and transportation while considering budgets and the executive's preferences.

  • Research: Conducting online research, compiling data, and preparing summaries or presentations to support decision-making.

  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM): Updating client information, managing contact lists, and assisting with sales or client-related follow-ups.

  • Additional Task Support: This can include event planning, social media management, data entry, and more, depending on the VEA's skillset and the executive's needs.


Learning, Development, and Building a Career as a VEA

  • Continuous development is key for VEAs. Here's how to enhance your skills and build a successful career:

  • Essential Skills Development: Focus on excellent communication (written and verbal), organizational skills, project management, problem-solving, and time management.

  • Software Proficiency: Become well-versed in productivity suites (Microsoft Office/Google Suite), email clients, communication platforms (Slack, Zoom, etc.), and project management tools (Trello, Asana, etc.).

  • Specialization: Develop expertise in specific areas like bookkeeping, social media management, or a particular industry. This will make you more valuable.

  • Networking: Connect with other VEAs, join online communities, and attend relevant conferences to broaden your professional network.

  • Mentorship: Seek guidance from experienced VEAs or consider formal training programs to accelerate your development.


Benefits of Fully Remote Work as a VEA

  • Flexibility: You set your own hours (with consideration for the executive's needs) and create a work-life balance that suits you.

  • Location Independence: Work from anywhere in the world, allowing for freedom to travel or choose a living situation that fits your preferences.

  • Cost Savings: Reduce commuting costs and gain the ability to live in areas with a lower cost of living.

  • Increased Productivity: Many individuals find a greater level of focus and productivity working from home.

  • Entrepreneurial Opportunities: Experienced VEAs often start their own businesses offering VEA services, providing greater earning potential and control.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in executive assistance and office management

courseDetails.title: AI Recruitment: Automate & Optimize Hiring with AI HR Tools
courseDetails.shortDescription: AI Recruitment | Hiring Automation | AI in HR | Recruitment Tech | Talent Acquisition | HR Automation | AI Sourcing | HR
courseDetails.longDescription:
The “AI in Recruiting and Sourcing” course at Mike Pritula Academy is designed to equip HR professionals, recruiters, and sourcers with the knowledge and skills to effectively integrate artificial intelligence into their recruitment processes. By leveraging AI tools, participants can enhance efficiency, attract high-quality candidates, and maintain a competitive edge in the talent acquisition landscape.


What You’ll Learn:

• AI Opportunities and Trends in Recruiting and Sourcing: Gain an understanding of artificial intelligence and its role in modern recruiting, including the latest trends, innovations, and successful case studies.

• Optimizing Job Texts and Images with AI: Learn how AI assists in creating and refining job descriptions, analyzing and improving job advertisement appeal, and automatically generating optimized images for job postings.

• Automated Candidate Selection: Discover how AI enhances candidate search and selection processes, including tools and algorithms for automatic candidate matching and integration with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

• Sourcing and Candidate Communication Automation: Explore AI tools for automating candidate sourcing, communication, and personalized messaging to improve engagement and response rates.

• Candidate Assessment and Interview Analysis: Understand the application of AI in evaluating candidate competencies, conducting and analyzing interviews, and utilizing tools for transcription and objective assessment.

• Enhancing Employer Branding and Recruitment Marketing: Learn how AI strengthens employer branding, analyzes and improves candidate interactions, and automates recruitment marketing strategies.


Course Program:

1. AI Opportunities and Trends in Recruiting and Sourcing:

• Introduction to AI and its role in modern recruiting.

• Overview of the latest trends and innovations in AI for recruiting.

• Examples of successful AI applications in recruiting.

• Potential risks and challenges when using AI in recruiting.

• Future predictions and expectations in recruiting.

2. Working with Job Texts and Images for Job Postings:

• How AI helps create and optimize job descriptions.

• Using AI to analyze and improve the attractiveness of job advertisements.

• Automatically creating and optimizing images for job postings using AI.

• Practical examples and tools.

• Recommendations for creating effective job advertisements.

3. Automated Candidate Selection for Vacancies:

• How AI improves the process of searching and selecting candidates.

• Tools and algorithms for automatic candidate selection.

• Integration with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

• Practical cases of using AI for selection.

• Effective strategies and best practices.

4. Automation of Sourcing and Candidate Communication:

• AI tools for automating candidate sourcing.

• Plugins and tools to enhance communication with candidates.

• Automation of creating and sending email sequences.

• Examples of effective sourcing and communication techniques.

• Basics of creating personalized messages and emails.

5. Candidate Assessment and Interview Analysis:

• Application of AI for assessing candidates and their competencies.

• AI technologies in conducting and analyzing interviews.

• Tools for automatic transcription and interview analysis.

• Approaches to objective candidate assessment using AI.

• How to avoid bias in candidate assessment.

6. Enhancing Employer Branding and Recruitment Marketing:

• The role of AI in forming and strengthening the employer brand.

• Using AI to analyze and improve candidate interactions.

• Automation and optimization of recruitment marketing.

• Examples of successful recruitment marketing strategies.

• Planning and measuring the effectiveness of candidate attraction campaigns.


Course Features:

• Expert Instruction: Learn from Mike Pritula, a seasoned HR leader with extensive experience in integrating AI into recruitment and sourcing processes.

• Flexible Learning: Access six recorded lessons at your own pace.

• Practical Application: Complete homework assignments with personalized feedback to reinforce learning.

• Interactive Community: Join a dedicated Q&A chat to discuss topics and share experiences with peers.

• Certification: Receive a diploma upon successful completion of the course, enhancing your professional credentials.


Who Should Enroll:

• Recruiters and Sourcers: Professionals aiming to stay current with AI advancements in recruitment and sourcing.

• HR Specialists: Individuals seeking to enhance their efficiency and effectiveness in talent acquisition through AI tools.

• Talent Acquisition Managers: Leaders looking to optimize their recruitment processes and strengthen their employer brand using AI.


By mastering AI applications in recruiting and sourcing, you can accelerate your hiring processes, attract top talent, and maintain a competitive edge in the industry. Enroll now to elevate your recruitment strategies!
targetAudiences: This course is for recruiters, HR professionals, talent acquisition specialists, and hiring managers looking to integrate AI into their recruitment process. It is also ideal for business owners, startup founders, and anyone interested in leveraging AI tools to automate and optimize hiring strategies. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced recruiter, this course will help you stay ahead in the evolving world of AI-driven recruitment.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Спроектируем базу данных популярного мессенджера и научимся писать все виды запросов к ней (видео, тесты, SQL-задачи)
courseDetails.longDescription:
У данного курса также есть бесплатная краткая версия (первые 2 часа видео). Ее можно найти в профиле автора.


SQL - это сложно, непонятно? Вовсе нет!

Язык запросов к базам данных - вполне себе логичный и интуитивно понятный язык.

И в данном курсе мы обязательно убедимся этом.


При этом знание баз данных нужно абсолютно всем АйТишникам: и программистам, и тестировщикам, и аналитикам, и даже менеджерам... Все понимают, что SQL - очень востребованный навык в нашей индустрии.


Это исключительно практический курс. Мы спроектируем базу данных популярного мессенджера и научимся писать запросы к ней. Обсудим вопросы взаимодействия с сервером, начиная с установки рабочего окружения и закончим командами набора DDL и DML. Научимся писать все виды типовых запросов.


Кому может быть полезен этот курс:

  • Новичкам - Отличная возможность познакомиться с базами данных и языком SQL на живом примере

  • Студентам - Получите отличную практику проектирования БД и написания запросов к ней

  • ИТ-специалистам - Расширите и структурируете свои знания в SQL, закроете пробелы. Получите +1 проект в портфолио


Чему можно научиться в курсе:

  • Проектировать БД - Обсудим подробно на конкретном примере набор команд DDL (data definition language)

  • Писать SQL запросы - Будем практиковаться с разными видами запросов к базе данных

  • Взаимодействовать с сервером - На примере базы MySQL данных научимся типовым операциям на сервере БД

courseDetails.longDescription:
Dear Ayurveda Learner,

Namaste!


I am a seasoned Ayurveda expert Vaidya Kanikaa, with 15 years of experience in Ayurveda practice and training. I am excited to welcome you to the world of Ayurveda and promote experiential learning!! Please watch free preview lectures. I am sure you will love them!


Welcome to "Find Your Ayurvedic Body Type: Diet & Lifestyle Guide," a transformative journey into the ancient wisdom of Ayurveda. This course is designed to help you discover your unique body type, or Dosha—Vata, Pitta, or Kapha—and provide personalized recommendations for diet and lifestyle to achieve optimal health and well-being.


In this comprehensive course, you'll start by learning the fundamental principles of Ayurveda, including the characteristics and functions of each Dosha. You'll then take an in-depth assessment to determine your specific body type. With this knowledge, you'll explore tailored dietary guidelines, including foods to favor and avoid, to maintain balance and harmony within your body.


The course also delves into lifestyle practices suited to each Dosha, covering daily routines, exercise, and stress management techniques that align with your unique constitution. You'll gain practical insights into seasonal adjustments, herbal remedies, and detoxification methods to support your health throughout the year.


By the end of this course, you will have a clear understanding of your Ayurvedic body type and the tools to create a personalized diet and lifestyle plan. Embrace the holistic approach of Ayurveda to boost your energy, enhance your well-being, and achieve lasting balance and vitality. Join us and unlock the secrets to a healthier, happier you.


  1. Understand the Prakriti: Explore the meaning, functions and impact of dosha, the three primary body types (prakriti), how the body types form and much more.

  2. Identify Your Prakriti: Understand your unique Ayurvedic body type—Vata, Pitta, or Kapha—through a detailed assessment.

  3. Explore Body Type Traits: Understand your body type and how your body behaves physically, physiologically, and emotionally. Learn the major traits so you can control or navigate them effectively.

  4. Dietary Guidelines: Learn specific dietary recommendations tailored to your Dosha to promote balance and optimal health.

  5. Food Classes: Get a detailed understanding of how you should consume grains, dairy, fruits, vegetables, alcohol, and many more classes of foods according to your body type.

  6. Lifestyle Practices: Discover daily routines, exercise regimens, and stress management techniques suitable for your body type.

  7. Practical Application: Gain practical tips and tools to implement Ayurvedic principles into your daily life, leading to sustainable health and wellbeing.

Expand your Ayurvedic journey by exploring my other courses. Dive into "Dinacharya: Mastering Daily Routines for Optimal Health," get deeper understanding of Ayurvedic concepts with "Detailed Fundamental Course in Ayurveda," and enhance your dietary knowledge with "Ayurvedic Nutrition: Eating for Balance and Wellness."

courseDetails.title: The Higher Self Blueprint: 21 Days of Self-Discovery
courseDetails.shortDescription: Daily Practices to Discover, Understand, and Embody Your True Self
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you ever feel disconnected from your true self? Are you searching for more meaning, purpose, and fulfilment in your life? Welcome to The Higher Self Blueprint: 21 Days of Self-Discovery. In this transformative course, you will embark on a personal journey that will help you reconnect with your authentic self, overcome limiting beliefs, and live with greater clarity and purpose.

Many of us struggle with questions like: Who am I? What is my purpose? Why do I feel disconnected from my true self? This course helps you answer these questions, going beyond surface-level understanding. It’s about discovering and embodying the essence of your higher self, shedding limiting beliefs, and learning to live in alignment with your true nature.

Through daily insights, transformative exercises, and guided meditations, you will:

  • Unlock Your True Essence: Understand and embrace who you really are, beyond your ego and conditioning.

  • Cultivate Self-Awareness: Develop a deeper understanding of your thoughts, emotions, and actions to create meaningful change.

  • Empower Your Life: Use practical tools and daily practices to build resilience, clarity, and fulfilment in all areas of life.

  • 21 Days of Daily Lessons: Each lesson offers insights, practical exercises, and meditations to help you integrate the teachings into your life.

  • Transformative Meditations: Guided meditations to connect you deeply with your higher self and release limiting beliefs.

  • Daily Self-Reflection Exercises: Reflection exercises to help you apply the teachings and create real transformation.

  • Practical Tools for Everyday Life: Tools and practices that will help you manifest your highest potential in all aspects of life.

Upon Completion:

You will have gained a renewed sense of clarity and purpose, unlocking new levels of self-mastery and spiritual insight. Approach each day with an awakened perspective, ready to embrace life’s journey with authenticity and grace.
targetAudiences: Anyone seeking deeper meaning and clarity in life.
Individuals feeling disconnected from their authentic selves and looking to align with their true purpose.
Those interested in practical self-improvement and growth through daily practices.
Anyone who wants to gain greater emotional mastery and live with more intention and self-awareness.
People ready to release limiting beliefs and transform their lives by connecting with their higher self.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Кому сегодня нужен Linux?
Программисту? - Да.
Тестировщику? - Да.
ИТ менеджеру? - Да.
Студенту ИТ университета? - Да!
Любому, интересующемуся АйТишечкой!
Всем - Linux! И добро пожаловать на борт!


Мы привыкли управлять нашими компьютерами с помощью мышки и в красивом графическом интерфейсе пользователя (GUI). Но это не путь Linux! Здесь по умолчанию все управляется текстовыми командами в Терминале. И, пройдя этот курс, Вы убедитесь, что это на самом деле более, чем удобно!


В материалах курса собраны наиболее широко используемые команды, позволяющие быстро начать работать в ОС Linux. Скучные и длинные лекции - не наш формат. Если Вы цените свое время, то здесь Вы найдете выжимку знаний, которые Вам действительно понадобятся для освоения этой операционной системы.


Курс основан на Linux Ubuntu, но любой другой популярный дистрибутив, который есть у Вас под рукой, также подойдет.


Вы узнаете про трюки и лайфхаки, которые помогут быстрее выполнять типовые операции. Познакомитесь со всеми необходимыми командами для работы с файлами и папками. Освоите работу с просмотрщиками файлов и самыми популярными текстовыми редакторами. И научитесь эффективно использовать поиск. Если забыли какую-то команду, которая Вам нужна или Вы не знаете, какую из них использовать для той или иной задачи, - в этом курсе мы обсудим способы поиска необходимых инструментов и инструкции к ним (вызов краткой и подробной справки).


Целевая аудитория: любой, желающий познакомиться с Линукс.


Дерзайте!

Namaste!

I am excited to welcome you to the world of Ayurveda and promote experiential learning!!

This course covers the fundamental concepts of Ayurveda. The course constitutes multiple video lectures This course contains lots of knowledge which can help you.

The 6000-year-old health care system, Ayurveda places a strong emphasis on nutrition. In Ayurveda, "Ahara" (diet) and "Anna" (food) are given particular importance.

Ayurveda says that the mind, body, and spirit are all nourished by wholesome, healthy food. While everyone's digestive ability varies, it is still important to eat foods that are easy to digest, tailored to their needs, and in the right amounts.

The right amount of food provides power and vitality, as well as maintaining the health of the tissues.

Elevate your expertise and transform your career with our "Ayurvedic Nutrition and Wellness Certification Course-Level 1". This comprehensive program is designed for those passionate about holistic health and wellness. Gain in-depth knowledge of Ayurvedic principles and their application to nutrition and overall well-being, guided by experienced practitioners.

Our course provides a robust understanding of Ayurvedic nutrition, covering topics such as dosha-specific diets, detoxification, herbal remedies, and lifestyle practices. Learn to create personalized nutrition plans that promote balance and vitality, addressing individual health needs and goals.

Why choose our certification course? This program combines traditional Ayurvedic wisdom with modern scientific insights, ensuring you receive a well-rounded education. Our curriculum is perfect for healthcare professionals, wellness coaches, nutritionists, and anyone interested in integrating Ayurvedic practices into their professional or personal life.

By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with the skills to implement effective Ayurvedic nutritional strategies and wellness plans. Earn a certification that distinguishes you as an expert in the field of Ayurvedic nutrition and wellness.

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y Cloudways
courseDetails.shortDescription: Crea una página web con WordPress y Cloudways, el mejor alojamiento en la nube administrado para WordPress.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS Y CLOUDWAYS?


Una página web es una herramienta excelente para facilitar la comunicación y la interacción con los clientes. A través de un sitio web, los usuarios pueden acceder a información sobre productos y servicios, realizar consultas, solicitar presupuestos, dejar comentarios y mucho más.


Tener una presencia en internet es imprescindible para cualquier tipo de negocio. No importa cuál sea el tamaño de tu negocio o la industria en la que desempeñes tu actividad, la importancia de una página web es indudable, ya que actúa como el mejor escaparate digital, lo que permite que las empresas estén al alcance de cualquiera en todo momento. ¡No estar en línea equivale a perder oportunidades de negocio y visibilidad! En un mundo cada vez más digital, la sostenibilidad de las empresas depende de cómo se adapten estas a la transformación digital.


¿QUÉ ES CLOUDWAYS?


Cloudways es una plataforma de alojamiento en la nube que permite crear y administrar aplicaciones web. Ofrece servicios de computación en la nube para empresas.

Características:

  • Permite elegir entre varios proveedores de infraestructura en la nube.

  • Ofrece hosting gestionado de WordPress y WooCommerce.

  • Cuenta con un panel de control.

  • Ofrece soporte técnico 24/7.

  • Realiza copias de seguridad gestionadas.

  • Cuenta con seguridad gestionada.

  • Ofrece escalabilidad de rendimiento.

  • Cuenta con almacenamiento en caché avanzado.

  • Ofrece protección contra malware.


Beneficios:


  • Permite a los desarrolladores y negocios concentrarse en sus aplicaciones y sitios web.

  • Elimina la necesidad de conocimientos técnicos avanzados.

  • Permite implementar populares aplicaciones basadas en PHP en el alojamiento de infraestructura.

  • Ofrece una experiencia de hosting gestionado optimizada.

  • Permite migrar sitios web sin interrupciones ni complicaciones.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página web con WordPress y Cloudways, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo crear una cuenta gratis en Cloudways.

  • Cómo crear un servidor e instalar WordPress en Cloudways.

  • Cómo instalar una plantilla para tu sitio web.

  • Cómo personalizar la cabecera y el pie de página de tu sitio web.

  • Cómo editar las páginas de tu sitio web con Elementor.

  • Cómo apuntar un dominio a tu servidor de Cloudways.

  • Cómo instalar un certificado SSL para tu sitio web.



¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y Cloudways", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 185,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un sitio web con WordPress y Cloudways de forma rápida y sencilla.


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender con WordPress y Cloudways.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca

courseDetails.longDescription:
Level Up Your English Skills!


This English course is designed to help you improve your language skills and gain confidence in real-world communication. You'll delve into practical topics like time, routines, and travel, while mastering essential grammar and vocabulary.


What You'll Learn:


Unit 1: Time and Activities


  • Learn how to tell time and discuss daily routines.

  • Practice using the present continuous tense.

  • Develop your listening skills by understanding conversations about time and activities.


Unit 2: Routines and Transportation


  • Discuss daily and weekly routines and transportation.

  • Master the simple present tense to talk about habits and schedules.

  • Improve your pronunciation and listening skills by focusing on third-person singular endings.


Course Features:


Engaging Lessons: Interactive lessons that combine grammar explanations, vocabulary building, and practical exercises.

Real-World Scenarios: Learn English through real-life situations, such as booking a hotel or planning a trip.

Expert Instruction: Experienced language teachers guide you through each lesson, providing clear explanations and feedback.

Flexible Learning: Study at your own pace and on your own schedule.

Interactive Activities: Practice your English through a variety of activities, including quizzes, role-plays, and writing exercises.


Join us and unlock your full language potential!


Important Note: This course is designed to be highly interactive. You will meet a character named (Faliz) who will participate in all activities. Please interact with me in this course in the same way that (Faliz) does to get the most out of this learning experience.

Why embark on a course about self-healing, embodying empowerment, and self-realization? Because most of us will spend our lives in search of answers: Where do we come from? Why are we here? With over 14 immersive videos and 14 guided meditations, each serves as a stepping stone toward becoming a more loving and compassionate individual.


Discover tools to unravel past traumas and inner conflicts, cultivating a mindset of healing and growth. With each lesson, learn to release negative patterns and behaviours, nurturing a positive mindset and healthier relationships.


Beyond self-discovery, this course empowers you with practical techniques to navigate life's challenges with grace and purpose. From accessing altered states of consciousness to deepening your connection with your higher self.


Upon completion, you will unlock new levels of self-mastery and embrace a life of joy and fulfillment. Approach each day with unwavering presence, ready to seize opportunities and embrace life's journey authentically and lovingly.

  • Embrace gratitude as your default state and see the basic goodness everywhere.

  • Utilize acceptance tools to alleviate unnecessary suffering.

  • Reconnect with your inner knowing and tap into universal intelligence.


Together, we'll embark on a healing journey in a safe and nurturing space. Prepare to delve deep into your innermost being, embracing every aspect with unconditional love and acceptance. Welcome to a very unique experience of transformation and growth.

¿QUÉ ES ELEMENTOR E-COMMERCE HOSTING?


La empresa de Elementor te ofrece una solución completa, la cuál no solo te incluye el servicio de hosting, sino también incluye de forma pre instalada la plataforma de WordPress, también incluye la versión de Elementor Pro, así como también incluye el Tema Premium Shoptimizer, entre todos los beneficios que incluye este servicio en su plan Sell Pro, obtienes 25 gigas de almacenamiento de disco duro, 100 gigas de ancho de banda por mes, lo cuál te permite recibir hasta 75.000 visitas mensuales.


Elementor e-Commerce Hosting ofrece una integración de dominio personalizado, con un asistente fácil de seguir que te guiará paso a paso, si aún no tienes un dominio personalizado puedes adquirir uno en Elementor e-Commerce Hosting, luego de adquirir tu dominio personalizado este se integrará y la configuración se realizará automáticamente, si aún no puedes adquirir un dominio en este momento, puedes crear tu tienda online sobre un subdominio gratuito bajo Elementor e-Commerce Hosting, en dónde puedes empezar de inmediato.


Elementor e-Commerce Hosting es un alojamiento de WordPress administrado con tecnología de la plataforma de Google Cloud, plataforma en la que confían miles de empresas de primer nivel gracias a su seguridad y confiabilidad de clase mundial.

En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar una tienda online con WordPress, también utilizaremos la plataforma de Elementor e-Commerce Hosting que nos brindará el apoyo y la arquitectura necesaria para diseñar nuestra tienda online en WordPress, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su tienda online con WordPress y Elementor e-Commerce Hosting, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su tienda online diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo contratar un plan de hosting en Elementor.

  • Cómo crear tiendas online profesionales con WordPress y Elementor Hosting desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu tienda online de forma profesional con el constructor visual de Elementor.

  • Cómo crear el contenido de tu tienda online con la ayuda de Elementor AI.

  • Cómo subir tus propios productos a tu tienda online para venderlos por Internet.

  • Cómo recibir pagos en tu tienda online mediante tarjeta de crédito, débito y PayPal.

courseDetails.title: Crea un MarketPlace Multi Vendedor con WordPress y Dokan
courseDetails.shortDescription: Genera ingresos creando tu propio Marketplace Multi Vendedor al estilo de Amazon o Mercado Libre.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UN MARKETPLACE MULTIVENDEDOR CON WORPDRESS, WOOCOMMERCE Y DOKAN PARA GENERAR INGRESOS CON MÚLTIPLES TIENDAS DESDE UN MISMO LUGAR?

El Marketplace se refiere a un concepto más amplio de ventas online. En esta plataforma, diferentes tiendas pueden anunciar sus productos, ofreciéndole de esa forma, un abanico de opciones al cliente.

El concepto de Marketplace no es nuevo. En América Latina surgió en 2012 y, hoy en día, muchas grandes empresas digitales ya se han adherido. Algunos ejemplos de Marketplace son Amazon, Google Shopping y Mercado Libre.

Como ya dijimos existen varias diferencias entre un Marketplace y un E-Commerce.

En el caso de un E-Commerce, entras en el sitio web de una tienda X y eliges un producto que es vendido y enviado por la propia tienda.

En el caso de un Marketplace puedes entrar en el sitio web de la tienda X y elegir un producto que está siendo vendido y enviado por la tienda Y.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


¿QUÉ ES WOOCOMMERCE?

WooCommerce es un plugin (complemento) de WordPress que permite implementar una tienda online totalmente funcional en una web.

Este plugin incluye todo lo necesario para empezar a vender en línea:

Las páginas de tienda, carrito, mi cuenta y finalizar compra, los métodos de pago más utilizados en el mundo (transferencia bancaria, PayPal y Stripe), un sistema para configurar diferentes tipos de impuestos y gastos de envío por zonas, etc.

Por supuesto, también permite la subida de un número ilimitado de productos para su venta, pudiendo añadir su precio, descripciones (una corta y una larga), variaciones del mismo, etc.

En definitiva, WooCommerce es una de las mejores opciones que existen para crear una tienda online.


¿QUÉ ES DOKAN?

Dokan es un complemento de múltiples proveedores para WordPress diseñado para ayudar a los proveedores a personalizar las tiendas y administrar el inventario de productos desde una plataforma unificada.

Proporciona una solución completa multivendedor para crear un marketplace con WooCommerce. Su diseño e interfaz súper intuitivos hacen la configuración y gestión de la tienda multivendedor muy sencilla, incluso para principiantes. Su automatización es tan completa que prácticamente sólo tendrás que revisar los pedidos

En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un Marketplace Multi Vendedor, utilizando la plataforma de WordPress y los plugins de WooCommerce y Dokan que nos brindará todas las funciones y opciones necesarias para crear y diseñar nuestro Marketplace Multi Vendedor, que llevarán su negocio a un siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su Marketplace Multi Vendedor con WordPress, WooCommerce y Dokan, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su Marketplace Multi Vendedor diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

Have you ever thought about what causes someone to persist when another would give up?

What causes a person to focus and utilize all their resources towards a goal?     What ultimately creates the difference between happiness and despair? The answer is beliefs.


Just Imagine, can there be anything more important than our thought process and our thoughts? Our thoughts create our reality, the reality that we live in, and spend the majority of our most valuable time. More importantly, the quality of your thinking determines the quality of your life. Our day-to-day thoughts create the beliefs that we process and these beliefs make us who we are (in a good way or in a bad way). 


Our thought process is actually something that we are engaged in every day of our lives, yet we always take it for granted without even acknowledging the fact that whatever we are doing and however we are feeling (emotionally) is totally dependent on our thought process and It is completely in our hand to make a difference in our life with our thinking pattern.


Changing beliefs/thought processes isn’t easy. Despite what some authors and speakers tell you, deeply ingrained beliefs aren’t going to disappear with one magical technique or method. But if your happiness and success are important to you it can be done. 

In this course, you will learn the complete 'blueprint' to free yourself from the tyranny of thoughts that limit your achievement. This course aims to be thought-provoking and this in return will help you to become aware of your thinking pattern and to control your thoughts instead of being controlled by them.


So, to have a breakthrough in YOUR happiness and emotional well-being... All you have to Do is CHANGE YOUR BELIEF SYSTEM/THOUGHT PROCESS

courseDetails.title: Change Management Mastery: Strategies for Success
courseDetails.shortDescription: Change Management | Business Transformation | Leadership | Organizational Change | Team Adaptation | Agile | HR
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mastering Change Management: Implementing Organizational Transformation


In today’s rapidly evolving business environment, change management is a critical skill for leaders, HR professionals, and managers. This course provides a structured, hands-on approach to organizational change, ensuring you can successfully plan, implement, and sustain business transformations.


By following Kotter’s Change Management Model and behavioral change strategies, this course equips you with practical tools to overcome resistance, engage employees, and embed change into corporate culture. Whether you are a Change Manager, HR professional, or business leader, you will develop the skills needed to lead successful transformations with confidence.


What You Will Learn:


Understand why change management is challenging and the common mistakes companies make

Implement Kotter’s 8-Step Change Model for structured transformation

Engage employees, build urgency, and create a change-ready culture

Leverage emotional intelligence to drive behavioral adaptation in change initiatives

Develop change strategies that align with business objectives

Utilize quick wins and reinforcement strategies to sustain long-term change

Implement Google’s CES Model to make change stick in corporate culture


Course Structure & Modules


Module 1: Why Change is Hard to Implement

• How employees and leaders perceive change

• Eight critical mistakes that derail change initiatives

• Impact of failed change efforts on business performance

• Key determinants of successful organizational change

• Kotter’s Change Management Model and how it drives transformation


Module 2: The 8 Steps of the Change Process

• Breaking large-scale change projects into manageable phases

• The role of managers and leaders in guiding employees through change

• Aligning organizational goals with change strategies


Module 3: Engaging Employees in Change

• Creating a sense of urgency for change within teams

• Reinforcing the need for change through communication and leadership

• The role of leadership in driving transformation

• Forming a change leadership team and defining responsibilities


Module 4: The Role of Emotions in Change

• Applying the Rider, Elephant, and Track Model to behavioral change

• Guiding rational thinking (Rider) during transformations

• Motivating employees (Elephant) to accept and support change

• Simplifying processes (Track) to remove barriers to adoption


Module 5: Developing a Change Strategy & Vision

• Crafting a compelling change vision that resonates with employees

• Promoting the vision internally to drive commitment

• Creating an environment that supports sustainable change

• Leveraging quick wins to reinforce momentum and trust in change initiatives


Module 6: Embedding Change into Company Culture

• Ensuring long-term adoption of new business processes and strategies

• Reinforcing change through company culture and leadership buy-in

• Google’s CES Model for Change Implementation and how it ensures sustainability

• Finalizing change initiatives and tracking long-term success

Why This Course Stands Out:


Practical Change Management Training – Focuses on real-world implementation of change strategies

Step-by-Step Change Frameworks – Covers Kotter’s Model, behavioral change methods, and Google’s CES approach

Hands-On Exercises & Assignments – Includes templates, checklists, and case studies

Comprehensive Learning Approach – Learn how to plan, execute, and sustain organizational change


Who Should Enroll?

  • Change Managers & Organizational Development Leaders

  • HR Professionals & Business Transformation Specialists

  • Project Managers Implementing Large-Scale Changes

  • CEOs, Executives, & Senior Leaders Managing Business Strategy

  • Consultants & Change Agents Leading Digital and Cultural Transformations

  • Enroll Today & Become a Change Management Expert!


Master organizational change frameworks, employee engagement strategies, and leadership-driven transformation techniques to drive business success.


This course provides a competitive edge by focusing on real-world applications, emotional intelligence in change, and leadership engagement, ensuring your ability to lead successful organizational transformations.


About the course:

Welcome to this In-Depth and Comprehensive Change Management Course!


In today’s fast-paced and ever-changing business environment, organizations must adapt to continuous transformations to stay competitive and relevant. Effective change management has become an essential skill for leaders, managers, and professionals across all sectors. This "Organization Change Management" course is tailored to provide you with the knowledge, strategies, and tools required to understand, plan, and implement successful organizational changes.


Discover the key to successful change delivery with this Organization Change Management course, carefully designed based on years of practical experience managing projects for industry leaders such as Oracle, Magna, SAP, Gazprom, FIS, EFES, and more.


This Organization Change Management course is built on my extensive experience working with major global corporations, including Oracle, Magna, SAP, Gazprom, FIS, EFES, and many others.


This Organization Change Management course delves into two major standards and methodologies: the Association of Change Management Professionals (ACMP) and ADKAR (developed by Prosci). This combination will provide you with the tools and knowledge needed to manage highly complex and large-scale change projects or initiatives with significant change components. If you aim to pursue certification in Change Management, this course will prepare you to pass the exams for both ACMP and PROSCI, enabling you to become a certified change management professional.


This Organization Change Management course is particularly beneficial for Project Managers, especially those holding PMI PMP certification. It will deepen your understanding of Change Management and its connection to Project Management, equipping you to excel in managing projects with substantial change elements. Additionally, it offers 12 PMI PDUs to support your certification maintenance.


This Organization Change Management course balances practical application with theoretical knowledge, following a logical progression of Change Management throughout the lifecycle of change project delivery.


A significant portion of this Organization Change Management course focuses on Analysis and Strategy for delivering change. Drawing from my experience, this aspect is typically executed in large, multinational corporations for complex change initiatives such as mergers, acquisitions, cultural transformations, or major reorganizations. These organizations often have a Global OCM (Organization Change Management Office) in place, as seen in companies like Oracle, SAP, Accenture, and Magna.


You will learn how to manage changes, assess the impact of change, and evaluate organizational readiness for change. From there, you will discover how to define a change strategy, create a Change Management Plan, and execute it effectively. You will gain a thorough understanding of these concepts and their application in major global corporations. As the course progresses, you will explore resistance management, sustainability of change, and the importance of engagement levels and types to ensure lasting and successful transformations. Mastering resistance management and sustainability is a critical differentiator between average and exceptional Change Managers.


Upon completing this Organization Change Management course, your perspective on changes and projects will shift toward a more strategic and forward-thinking approach. You will be able to see the bigger picture, anticipate future risks, and prevent issues that could jeopardize the success of change initiatives. Your insights and expertise will bring immediate value to your organization.


Additionally, you will learn how to raise awareness for change, foster desire for change, and secure support and commitment. You will also gain skills to build knowledge and ability within employees, ensuring their success post-change implementation.


This Organization Change Management course will distinguish you from average Change or Project Managers. By applying the tools and techniques learned here, you will become a highly valuable asset to your organization, enhancing your career advancement opportunities.


After completing the training and applying the knowledge to deliver several projects, you will likely advance to high-value strategic change initiatives or move into higher management roles, recognized as someone who consistently delivers value.


This Organization Change Management course is ideal for anyone responsible for driving change within organizations, including Change Managers, Project Managers, HR professionals, Team Leaders, Managers, and Senior Managers.


It is also perfect for those aspiring to become certified change management professionals through Prosci (ADKAR) or ACMP.


While some experience in managing change or projects is helpful, it is not mandatory, as all concepts are explained in detail. However, a basic understanding of project management theory is recommended.

courseDetails.title: Plugins de WordPress Para SiteGround
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a usar y configurar los plugins de WordPress para SiteGround paso a paso.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS APRENDER A USAR Y CONFIGURAR LOS PLUGINS DE WORDPRESS PARA SITEGROUND?


SITEGROUND es un servicio de alojamiento web que proporciona alojamiento compartido, alojamiento en la nube, soluciones empresariales, alojamiento de correo electrónico y registro de dominio.  Actualmente proporciona alojamiento para aproximadamente 2,000,000 de dominios en todo el mundo.


SiteGround proporciona servicios de alojamiento web para sitios web de WordPress , Joomla , Magento , Drupal , PrestaShop y WooCommerce.


El servicio de hosting de SiteGround ofrece planes para cualquier tipo de web que tengas en mente.


SiteGround es un hosting multiservicio ampliamente recomendable para cualquier proyecto. Además de hosting, gestiona dominio, webmail, y otros servicios relacionados. Tiene un completo y profesional soporte técnico y atención al cliente dispuesto a atenderte.


¿QUÉ ES SITEGROUND MIGRATOR?


SiteGround Migrator es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround que nos ayuda a migrar un sitio web con WordPress a tu cuenta en SiteGround desde cualquier otra compañía de alojamiento web.

Para migrar un sitio web en WordPress con el plugin SiteGround Migrator, básicamente hay que realizar los siguientes pasos:

  • Generar un token de migración en el Site Tools de SiteGround.

  • Instalar el plugin SiteGround Migrator en tu WordPress.

  • Pegar el token de migración en el plugin para comenzar la migración.

  • Comprobar tu sitio y actualizar los registros DNS para terminar la migración.


¿QUÉ ES SECURITY OPTIMIZER?


Security Optimizer es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround para proteger un sitio web de WordPress y prevenir una serie de amenazas como ataques de fuerza bruta, inicios de sesión comprometidos, fugas de datos y más.


El plugin ofrece características como:

  • Evitar el malware común.

  • Defenderte contra los ataques de fuerza bruta.

  • Añadir protección XSS avanzada para proteger carpetas críticas y que no se inyecten archivos maliciosos.

  • Ocultar tu versión de WordPress.

  • Eliminar el archivo readme.txt predeterminado.

  • Proteger el inicio de sesión.

  • Habilitar verificación en dos pasos (con Google Authenticator).

  • Cambiar la URL de inicio de sesión.

  • Impedir usar «admin» como nombre de usuario.

  • Las actividades quedan registradas en el Activity log y además facilita funciones para reaccionar ante posibles ataques desde la sección «Acciones después de un hackeo» para:

    • Cerrar sesión automáticamente a todos los usuarios.

    • Obligar a cambiar las contraseñas.

    • Reinstalar todos tus plugins.


¿QUÉ ES SPEED OPTIMIZER?


Speed Optimizer es un plugin todo en uno para mejorar el rendimiento de WordPress, diseñado y desarrollado por SiteGround. Este plugin tiene todas las funcionalidades que necesitarás para asegurarse de que tu sitio de WordPress funcione de la mejor manera, sin importar en qué plataforma de hosting esté alojado.

HR Analytics: Transforming Human Resource Management with Data-Driven Insights


Course Description:


In the modern data-driven workplace, HR analytics plays a crucial role in transforming how businesses make strategic decisions about their workforce. The HR Analytics course is expertly designed to help HR professionals, managers, and business leaders harness the full potential of people analytics, gain actionable insights, and drive measurable business results.


In this hands-on program, you will learn how to apply advanced HR analytics tools and techniques to optimize your human resources strategy. From calculating essential HR metrics to building predictive models and creating powerful HR dashboards, this course provides the foundational skills and advanced insights necessary to elevate your organization’s human resources analytics practices.


What You’ll Learn:

• Foundations of HR Analytics: Understand the fundamentals of HR analytics and how to apply them for effective decision-making across human resource functions.

• HR Metrics and Reporting: Learn how to calculate and analyze key HR metrics such as turnover rates, employee retention, and recruitment efficiency.

• Advanced People Analytics Tools: Master cutting-edge HR analytics tools like Excel, Power BI, and data visualization platforms to present impactful HR data insights.

• Predictive HR Analytics Models: Build predictive models using machine learning (ML) and statistical techniques to forecast employee performance, retention, and engagement.

• Employee Lifetime Value (ELV) Analytics: Calculate and optimize Employee Lifetime Value to assess workforce return on investment (ROI) and improve talent management strategies.

• HR Dashboard Design: Create dynamic HR dashboards for real-time tracking and reporting of key human resource analytics data.

• Data-Driven Recruitment Analytics: Implement recruitment analytics to optimize the hiring process, from sourcing candidates to reducing time-to-hire.

• Employee Engagement and Performance Analytics: Measure employee engagement and productivity using proven HR analytics models for continuous improvement.

• Turnover and Retention Analytics: Identify patterns in employee turnover and develop data-driven retention strategies using advanced HR analytics techniques.

• HR Data Visualization: Design effective data visualizations for HR leadership to communicate insights clearly and effectively.

Who Should Enroll:

5. Advanced Recruitment Analytics

6. Predictive HR Analytics Models

8. Turnover and Retention Metrics

What are Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A)?

  • Merger: Two companies of relatively similar size combine forces to create a new, single entity. This is often a move for market expansion or gaining a competitive edge.

  • Acquisition: One company purchases a majority stake or all of another company. The acquiring company gains control of the acquired company's assets and operations. This can be done to enter new markets, eliminate competition, or gain new technology resources.


Key Pitfalls in M&A

  • Culture Clash: Combining distinct company cultures can lead to employee conflicts, low morale, and a decline in productivity.

  • Overpaying: Enthusiasm can lead companies to overpay for an acquisition, resulting in financial losses down the line.

  • Poor Integration: Failure to smoothly integrate systems, processes, and teams creates operational chaos and hinders the potential of the combined entity.

  • Lack of Due Diligence: Insufficient research about the target company's financial health, legal standing, or market position might expose hidden liabilities and risks.

  • Loss of Focus: The complexity of the M&A process can distract from core business operations, leading to neglected customers or missed opportunities.


Why is Learning About M&A Important for Companies and Managers?

  • Strategic Growth: M&A can be a powerful tool to expand into new markets, acquire new technologies, eliminate competitors, or increase market share significantly.

  • Responding to Market Changes Companies must adapt to industry shifts. An M&A strategy can be vital for staying ahead of the competition or even surviving.

  • Leadership Development: M&A success relies heavily on the ability of managers to navigate complexity, integrate teams, and make crucial decisions under pressure.


How Can M&A Skills Support Career Development?

  • Increased Demand: As M&A activity continues to be prevalent, professionals with these skills are highly sought after by companies, investment banks, and consulting firms.

  • Leadership Opportunities: M&A skills signal strategic thinking, problem-solving abilities, and a talent for execution – all assets for leadership roles.

  • Broader Skillset: M&A involves exposure to various aspects of business such as finance, valuation, negotiation, and legal, thus developing a more versatile skillset.

  • Higher Compensation: M&A professionals often command higher salaries due to their specialized knowledge and in-demand skillsets.

What is the Real Estate Business?

The real estate business encompasses all activities related to the buying, selling, renting, development, and management of land and buildings. This includes:

  • Residential Real Estate: Homes, apartments, condominiums, and other housing types.

  • Commercial Real Estate: Office buildings, retail spaces, warehouses, industrial properties, hotels, and more.

  • Land: Undeveloped land, agricultural land, and properties with development potential.

  • Real Estate Brokerage: Facilitating transactions between buyers and sellers.

  • Real Estate Development: Transforming land into usable properties.

  • Property Management: Overseeing the operations of rental properties.


Why is Learning About the Real Estate Business Important for Companies and Managers?


Real estate knowledge has significant implications for businesses, regardless of their core industry:

  • Cost Management: Real estate is often a company's second-largest expense after personnel costs. Understanding lease negotiations, property values, and market trends is crucial for making informed financial decisions.

  • Business Expansion: When a company intends to grow, strategic real estate decisions play a vital role. Site selection, facility planning, and understanding local land-use regulations are essential for successfully scaling operations.

  • Asset Optimization: Companies often own more real estate than they need. Learning about sale-leaseback options or subleasing excess space can unlock hidden capital and improve a company's bottom line.

  • Workplace Strategy: The design and function of workplaces significantly affect employee productivity, well-being, and recruitment. Real estate knowledge informs optimal workplace strategies.

  • Investment Opportunities: For some larger corporations, investing in real estate can offer diversification and potential for additional revenue streams.


How Real Estate Skills Connect to Global Careers and Professional Services

Skills in the real estate field open doors to a wide range of fulfilling and lucrative global career opportunities:

  • International Real Estate Development: As companies expand globally, those with real estate development experience can contribute to planning and executing new facilities in foreign markets.

  • Global Site Selection: Professionals versed in real estate analysis can help multinational corporations identify the best locations for their operations, considering factors like demographics, infrastructure, and local regulations.

  • Cross-Border Transactions: Facilitating real estate sales and purchases across international borders requires navigating complex legal and financial systems.

  • Hospitality and Tourism: The global hospitality industry is heavily intertwined with real estate. Professionals who understand hotel development and management can have exciting international careers.

  • Consulting Services: Real estate consultants use their expertise to offer a range of services to corporations, investors, and governments worldwide.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Crea una página web de nicho y genera ingresos con los anuncios de Google Adsense.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB Y GENERAR INGRESOS CON LOS ANUNCIOS DE GOOGLE ADSENSE?


Google AdSense es un programa que permite a los propietarios de sitios web, blogs o foros monetizar sus contenidos con anuncios. Los anuncios se colocan en el sitio web y los editores obtienen ingresos en función de la cantidad de usuarios que los vean o interactúen con ellos.


Google AdSense elige los anuncios más adecuados para el sitio web en función del contenido y de los usuarios que lo visitan. Los anunciantes crean y pagan por los anuncios. La cantidad de ingresos que obtiene el editor varía en función del tipo de anuncio y de la cantidad de usuarios que interactúan con él.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA LA PLATAFORMA DE WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar una página web para Google Adsense, utilizando la plataforma de WordPress y el tema de Hostinger para Afiliados que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestra página web para Google Adsense, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página web para Google Adsense, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.



¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu página web para Google Adsense.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress y un certificado SSL para tu dominio.

  • Cómo crear páginas web profesionales para Google Adsense desde cero.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu página web de forma profesional.

  • Cómo crear el contenido de tu página web con la ayuda de la Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo crear artículos para tu página web con la ayuda de la Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu página web.

  • Cómo crear una cuenta en Google Adsense.

  • Cómo mostrar los anuncios de Google Adsense en tu página web de forma manual y automática.

  • Cómo adaptar tu página web para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página Web Para Google Adsense", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 185,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear una página web para Google Adsense de forma rápida y sencilla.

4. Mise en œuvre efficace des stratégies : Maîtrisez l’utilisation des KPIs, OKRs et des disciplines de performance pour exécuter les stratégies.

8. Gestion financière : Découvrez les bases de la gestion financière, la budgétisation et les stratégies pour améliorer la trésorerie.

O Generalista de RH desempenha um papel fundamental na gestão e execução das principais funções de RH que apoiam o sucesso de uma organização. Este curso online abrangente, liderado pelo especialista da área Mike Pritula, foi projetado para capacitar profissionais de RH, aspirantes e atuantes, com ferramentas e conhecimentos essenciais para se destacarem em recrutamento, engajamento de colaboradores, cultura corporativa e muito mais.


O que você aprenderá:


• Funções principais de RH: Compreenda as diversas responsabilidades de um Generalista de RH, incluindo recrutamento, integração, relações com funcionários e administração.


• Desenvolvimento de estratégia de RH: Aprenda a alinhar práticas de RH com os objetivos de negócios e a justificar decisões estratégicas.


• Motivação e engajamento de funcionários: Desenvolva e implemente estratégias para fidelizar, aumentar a moral e melhorar a produtividade.


• Ferramentas e análises de RH: Domine ferramentas de automação de RH, conduza auditorias e aplique análises para tomar decisões baseadas em dados.


Programa do curso:

1. Quem é um Generalista de RH e seu papel na empresa: Explore a importância e as competências necessárias para o sucesso nessa função.

2. Entendendo os negócios da empresa e justificando decisões: Alinhe iniciativas de RH com objetivos organizacionais.

3. Conduzindo auditorias de RH: Avalie funções de RH, identifique lacunas e proponha melhorias.

4. Pesquisas de opinião dos colaboradores: Aprenda a criar e implementar pesquisas de engajamento e satisfação.

5. Desenvolvimento de estratégias de RH: Crie estratégias abrangentes alinhadas aos objetivos organizacionais.

6. Seleção, recrutamento e avaliação de candidatos: Domine processos de recrutamento, desde a busca até a avaliação de talentos.

7. Adaptação de funcionários: Implemente programas eficazes de integração e adaptação para novos colaboradores.

8. Treinamento e desenvolvimento de colaboradores: Planeje e execute programas de treinamento impactantes.

9. Motivação de colaboradores: Crie programas para aumentar a moral, engajamento e lealdade dos funcionários.

10. Gestão de folha de pagamento: Entenda os fundamentos da gestão de folha de pagamento e seu papel no RH.

11. Pacotes de benefícios: Desenvolva e gerencie pacotes de benefícios abrangentes.

12. Gestão de desempenho e OKRs: Utilize ferramentas como OKRs para alinhar desempenho individual com objetivos organizacionais.

13. Engajamento e fidelização de colaboradores: Desenvolva estratégias para medir e aprimorar o engajamento.

14. Lidando com o burnout: Mitigue o burnout dos colaboradores para manter uma equipe produtiva.

15. Comunicação interna na empresa: Desenvolva estratégias de comunicação interna eficazes.

16. Gestão da cultura corporativa: Cultive e mantenha uma cultura corporativa positiva alinhada aos valores da organização.

17. Fundamentos de gestão de pessoas: Aprenda habilidades essenciais para gerenciar e liderar equipes.

18. Automação de RH: Explore as melhores ferramentas para otimizar processos de RH.

19. Conduzindo reuniões individuais: Estruture reuniões eficazes com colaboradores.

20. Retenção de talentos: Desenvolva estratégias para reduzir a rotatividade e reter os melhores talentos.

21. Análises de RH: Use dados para tomar decisões informadas e melhorar o desempenho de RH.

22. Orçamento de RH: Crie e gerencie orçamentos para iniciativas de RH.


Características do curso:


• Instrução especializada: Aprenda com Mike Pritula, líder em RH com vasta experiência no desenvolvimento de estratégias e equipes de RH.

• Aprendizado flexível: Acesse 22 PowerWebinars gravados e uma sessão ao vivo no seu ritmo.

• Aplicação prática: Realize tarefas com feedback personalizado para reforçar seu aprendizado.

• Comunidade interativa: Participe de um chat no Telegram para discutir tópicos e compartilhar experiências.

• Certificação: Receba um diploma ao concluir o curso com sucesso, destacando sua expertise em RH.


Para quem é este curso:


• Profissionais aspirantes a RH: Pessoas que desejam ingressar na área com uma base sólida em funções generalistas.

• Praticantes atuais de RH: Profissionais que buscam expandir conhecimentos e progredir para cargos de liderança.

• Gestores de RH em pequenas empresas: Aqueles que gerenciam múltiplas responsabilidades de RH em PMEs.


Adquira as habilidades essenciais para se destacar como Generalista de RH e impulsionar o sucesso organizacional. Inscreva-se agora para começar sua jornada de liderança em recursos humanos.
targetAudiences: Este curso destina-se a aspirantes a profissionais de RH, gerentes de RH atuais e profissionais de RH de pequenas empresas que desejam desenvolver habilidades abrangentes de RH, aprimorar processos e avançar em suas carreiras em recursos humanos.

courseDetails.title: Feedback Mastery: Giving & Receiving Constructive Feedback
courseDetails.shortDescription: Constructive Feedback | Performance Review | Communication Skills | Leadership | Radical Candor | Continious Feedback
courseDetails.longDescription:
Mastering Employee Feedback: Creating a Culture of Growth and Improvement


Course Description:


Employee feedback is one of the most powerful tools for driving performance, engagement, and professional development. Yet, many managers and leaders struggle to give and receive feedback effectively. This course is designed to help HR professionals, managers, and business leaders build a strong feedback culture within their organizations.


Through practical strategies and real-world examples, you will learn how to overcome feedback barriers, integrate continuous feedback loops, and implement recognition programs that drive motivation and productivity.


What You Will Learn:

• Understand why feedback is critical for employee engagement and performance.

• Overcome common barriers to giving feedback and develop confidence in feedback conversations.

• Master giving feedback using structured models and techniques.

• Learn to separate feedback from performance evaluation to foster growth.

• Implement feedback loops across teams and throughout the organization.

• Use feedback as a tool for coaching, development, and leadership growth.

• Recognize employee achievements and create a culture of appreciation.


Who Should Take This Course?

• HR professionals who want to improve feedback practices within their organization.

• Managers and team leaders looking to create a feedback-driven culture.

• Executives and business owners aiming to enhance employee engagement through feedback.

• Anyone looking to master the art of giving and receiving feedback in a professional setting.


Course Program:


Class 1: What is Employee Feedback and Why It Matters

• Why many people avoid giving feedback and how to change this mindset.

• The paradox: how we receive feedback everywhere but not enough from leaders.

• Understanding what feedback really is and why it is essential for organizational success.

• The role of feedback in performance improvement and employee growth.

• Why Generation Z values feedback more than previous generations.

• A simple yet effective tool for giving feedback with impact.


Class 2: What Prevents Effective Feedback and How to Overcome Barriers

• Common challenges in giving feedback and how to address them:

• Lack of support from leadership.

• False beliefs that hinder open communication.

• The role of stress and emotional resistance.

• Lack of structured feedback skills.

• Strategies to change beliefs about feedback and create a growth mindset.

• Techniques to reduce stress and anxiety when giving feedback.


Class 3: Separating Feedback from Employee Evaluation

• Why feedback and performance review are not the same.

• The importance of continuous feedback over once-a-year evaluations.

• The six-step model for daily feedback that fosters engagement.

• Preparing a structured feedback script for meaningful conversations.

• How to request feedback from employees to build trust.

• Creating a feedback cycle that promotes growth and improvement.

• Developing the skills to become a true feedback-driven coach.


Class 4: Running Feedback Loops Across the Organization

• How to introduce feedback at all levels of the company.

• Implementing feedback in executive and leadership teams.

• Identifying feedback barriers and breaking them down.

• Applying the six-step feedback model across departments.

• Structuring company-wide feedback initiatives for long-term success.


Class 5: Advanced Feedback Techniques and Leadership Hacks

• Feedback tips for different personality types.

• The concept of “feedback on feedback”—improving the way we give feedback.

• Using feedback to enhance leadership skills and managerial effectiveness.

• Addressing common questions and concerns about feedback culture.


Class 6: Recognizing Achievements as Part of a Feedback Culture

• Why recognition and feedback go hand in hand.

• Setting up monetary and non-monetary recognition programs.

• Implementing Peer-to-Peer Recognition using Google’s approach as an example.

• How to design an Employee of the Month program that truly motivates.

• Using gamification to make achievement recognition more engaging.


Why Take This Course?

• Learn from Mike Pritula, a feedback and leadership expert with extensive HR experience.

• Develop practical skills to integrate feedback into daily work routines.

• Gain real-world tools and frameworks to apply immediately in your organization.

• Receive a certificate of completion validating your expertise in feedback and performance management.

Enroll Today!


Master the art of giving and receiving feedback and transform your organization’s feedback culture. Whether you’re a manager, HR professional, or executive, this course will equip you with the skills to build a high-performing and engaged workforce through effective feedback practices.


Sign up now and start improving your feedback culture today!
targetAudiences: This course is designed for HR professionals, managers, team leaders, and anyone looking to improve their feedback delivery skills, foster employee engagement, and create a culture of recognition and continuous improvement in their organization.
